speak;Garcia;Forde, what are you doing there?|Shouldn't you be preparing with the others?
expression;Forde;Smile
speak;Forde;Ah, Garcia!|I was just admiring the architecture here in Grado.
speak;Forde;Have you noticed how different the buildings are compared to ours in Renais?
speak;Garcia;Can't say I've paid much attention to that.|We've been marching non-stop for days.
speak;Forde;That's exactly why we should take a moment to appreciate our surroundings!|Look at those arches and the stonework patterns.
speak;Forde;The way they use darker stones for accent pieces...|It's completely different from our architecture back home.
speak;Forde;And yet, there's something about it that's quite appealing to the eye.|The proportions, the way the light plays off the surfaces...
speak;Garcia;Hmm, now that you mention it...|I think I understand what you're getting at.
speak;Garcia;Back in Ide, I helped build quite a few structures in my time.|You develop an eye for balance and sturdy construction.
speak;Forde;Exactly!|I'm glad what I'm saying is getting across to you!
speak;Forde;Most of the knights just tell me to stop daydreaming and focus on battle.|But there's more to life than just fighting, don't you think?
expression;Garcia;Smile
speak;Garcia;Ha ha!|Indeed there is, lad!|A warrior should be aware of the world he's fighting to protect.
speak;Garcia;Though I doubt my son Ross would grasp our conversation right now.|He's still at that age where everything is about becoming stronger.
speak;Forde;Give the boy time.|He'll come around eventually.
speak;Forde;Perhaps I should sketch some of these buildings before we move on.|Would make for a nice painting once we return home.
speak;Garcia;If we return home, you mean.|But I like your optimism, Forde.
speak;Garcia;Maybe when this war is over, you can show Ross how to appreciate these finer things in life.|The boy could use some broader perspectives.
expression;Forde;Smile
speak;Forde;It would be my pleasure.|And who knows? He might have a hidden talent for the arts!
bop_portrait;Garcia
speak;Garcia;Ha ha ha!|That would certainly be something to see!
speak;Garcia;Come on then, let's rejoin the others.|You can admire the architecture as we march.
speak;Forde;Right behind you!|Just let me commit this view to memory first...
